segments.text: I hear that you've been to the Saikei Ski Resort for the weekend . Did you enjoy it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's so exciting , though I had the most falls in our skiing team .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Isn't there any coach to teach you how to ski ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course there is . The top-level coaches there are from the State Sports General Administration .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes.My face even ached in the icy wind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was skiing on and on excitedly until I realized one thing-I could not stop ! You can just imagine how terrified I was .
segments.speaker: S2
